global./-togglegeo: Toggles between geometry editor and basic style geometry rendering
global./-toggleeffects: Toggles effect viewing, and cycles through the currently shown effect
global./-swichlayers: Switch layers on menu with fields

GE.-inverse: Turns walls to air and vise versa. also inverse slopes.
GE.-walls: Turns the cell into a solid wall
GE.-slope: Turns the cell into slope. can be rotated
GE.-floor: Turns the cell into a floor
GE.-move: Moves camera like MMB (also works as a ruler with rectangle select)
GE.-dragonden: Places a creature den, which creatures can be set to spawn in
GE.-entrance: Places a room entrance, which is used to connect different rooms to each other
GE.-mirror: Toggles mirror mode. Horizontal or vertical. position can be changed
GE.-flychains: Prevents batflies from forming chains in this cell
GE.-scavengerhole: Places a scavenger hole, where scavengers can travel to and from the offscreen den
GE.-garbagewormden: Places a garbage worm den, where a garbage worm can spawn from
GE.-clearlayer: Removes only cell, leaves added cells
GE.-whack_a_mole_hole: Places a mole hole, which creatures can use to travel to any other mole hole in the level
GE.-replacestate: Not replaces air after pasting data.
GE.-tool_circle_hollow: Changes RMB to hollow circle tool
GE.-tool_rect_hollow: Changes RMB to hollow rectangle tool
GE.alt_func: Hold to activate alt mouse mode (rectangle select)
GE.brush_size_scroll: Hold this key and scroll using the mouse wheel to change brush size

TE.force_geometry: Hold to place a tile's geometry specs along with the tile
TE.force_place: Hold to place a tile without its geometry specs
TE.-changetools: Toggle between rectangle select and single placement
TE.alt_func: Hold to activate alt mouse mode (rectangle select)
TE.brush_size_scroll: Hold this key and scroll using the mouse wheel to change brush size

CE.-addright: Rotates nearest edge of nearest camera clockwise
CE.-addcamera: Adds camera at center of level
CE.-togglemode: Toggles betwen Edit and Move modes
CE.-togglesnap: Toggles camera snapping position to other nearby cameras
CE.-addup: Moves nearest edge of nearest camera out of original position
CE.-adddown: Moves nearest edge of nearest camera to original position
CE.-addleft: Rotates nearest edge of nearest camera counter-clockwise

PE.-rotate0: Rotates prop to 0 degrees, facing north
PE.-rotate270: Rotates prop to 270 degrees, facing west
PE.-rotate180: Rotates prop to 180 degrees, facing south
PE.-rotate90: Rotates prop to 90 degrees, facing east
PE.stretch_topleft: Moves top left corner to mouse position
PE.stretch_topright: Moves top right corner to mouse position
PE.stretch_bottomright: Moves bottom right corner to mouse position
PE.stretch_bottomleft: Moves bottom left corner to mouse position
PE.mouserotate: Hold to rotate held prop around a pivot point using the mouse
PE.propvariation_change: While pressed, press mouse buttons to change variation
PE.rotate_speedup: Increases speed of prop rotation while held
PE.cursor_propdepth_inverse: While pressed, press RMB to change depth down
PE.moreinfo: Hold to change rotation to only rotate the cursor. Useful in very niche cases
PE.changerelease: Cycles through a rope prop's 'release' setting

FE.brush_size_scroll: Hold this key and scroll using the mouse wheel to change brush size

LE.-inverse: Toggle between painting and erasing shadows
LE.brush_type_scroll: Hold this key and scroll using the mouse wheel to change brush shape

LP.-changeborder: Toggles between a solid and open level border
LP.-water: Changes current tool to water adding
LP.-sizing: Changes current tool to level resizing
